Room.Name: Waters Below High Sea Cliffs
Room.ShortDescription: You are swimming in the waters below some very tall sea cliffs.
Room.LongDescription: The cliffs are forbidding and dark, and the current sweeps you past them with a rush. A rugged base is a jumble of giant rocks with waves crashing on them sending spray high into the air. In the distance you can see seals and sea lions playing in the water.
